title.rendered: Paris Fashion Week. Louis Vuitton SS2021.

content.rendered:
October 6, Louis Vuitton house closed Paris Fashion Week Spring-Summer 2021 with an amazing show for 200 distinguished guests and celebrities. We captured our favorite looks, so you can imagine yourself among them and get inspired.


Which look do you like the most?


Photojournalist: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad. Production: Fashionview for 24Fashion.tv

Gorgeous, stunning and sublime model - Natalia Vodianova

Handsome and elegant CEO of Berluti @berluti - Antoine Arnault

Most elegant couple in Paris Antoine Arnault and Natalia Vodianova

Tempting and beautiful model and a girlfriend of Cristiano Ronaldo - Georgina Rodriguez

Gorgeous and graceful French actress - La Seydoux

Glamorous and charming Actress - Alicia Vikander

Bewitching Paola Locatelli 

Classy, charming and tempting Model and influencer - Clara Berry 

Graceful Actress - Marina Fos

Stylish Eric Tk Yall

Pretty Fashionista Sheila

Adorable Venus Williams

Amazing American actress and former model - Laura Ruth Harrier

Charming French actress and singer - Chiara Mastroianni

Princess Maria-Olympia of Greece

Stylish model and fashionista (madame France 2019 - Abigail Betsabe Lopez Cruz

Elegant Journalist and Fashion Designer - Alexandra Golovanoff

Always elegant and stylish French fashion editor - Carine Roitfeld

Very popular French humorist - Jean-Philippe Janssens

A Famous French ballet dancer - Hugo Marchand

Gorgeous French journalist Sophie Fontanel

Beautiful model - Regina Anikiy
